casebody.data:
In re UNITED STATES PIPE AND FOUNDRY COMPANY. No. 8652. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 10, 1937. W. W. Ñaman, of Waco, Tex., for petitioner.

Before FOSTER, SIBLEY, and HUTCHESON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM. '

It is ordered that the petition for writ of mandamus applied for in the above numbered and entitled cause be denied.
